title: Teacher Knowledge Development Program Through Video Coaching

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Learning environment for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields who lack teaching experience but need to perform as knowledge transmitters, utilizing smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can reflectively analyze their teaching methods based on video coaching feedback and propose improvement strategies
Learners can specify context-specific educational strategies through peer assessment in a PBL environment
Learners can apply a video-based reflection model in real educational settings within six months, improving educational effectiveness by 20% or more

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
